properties.body:
WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
SARDINIA.
DNC 08.
VESSEL, 27 PERSONS ON BOARD, UNREPORTED TO SARDINIA
(40-00N 009-00E). LAST KNOWN POSITION IN VICINITY
38-00N 008-00E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 390 6592 4145,
3906 5908 4409, FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
